page.title: Simple Example Using Redis Keys
page.description: Redis can be used to get/set keys/value pairs.

section.example:
dim redis as extension::RedisClient = extension::RedisClient::CreateClient() dim list as extension::RedisResult
redis.LPush("GroceryCart","Bannanas") redis.LPush("GroceryCart","Apples") redis.LPush("GroceryCart","Milk")
list = redis.LRange("GroceryCart") ? list.type = "Array"
? list.valueString = Milk Apples Bannanas
dim item as extension::RedisResult item = list.GetItem(1) ? item.valueString = "Milk"
item = list.GetItem(2) ? item.valueString = "Apples"
item = list.GetItem(3) ? item.valueString = "Bannanas"
item = redis.LPop("GroceryCart") ? item.valueString = "Milk"
list = redis.LRange("GroceryCart") ? list.type = "Array" ? list.valueString = Apples Bannanas
item = redis.RPop("GroceryCart") ? item.valueString = "Bannanas"
list = redis.LRange("GroceryCart") ? list.type = "Array"
? list.valueString = "Apples"
redis.Del("GroceryCart")
